overview: After a bad breakup, Max gets talked into going to a music festival with her best friend Tess and her bad news boyfriend Travis. A few hours into their road trip, the group of friends pick up a couple of hitchhikers heading to the same event. After sundown, their entire plan falls apart – the car breaks down in the middle of nowhere and the wary travelers decide to camp out in the woods until morning. What happens under the cover of darkness will change the course of their entire lives… and yes. They will regret it.
title: You Will Regret This
